name: Giraffic Light (Gabby Delforge)
description:
Giraffes. Traffic. One bad pun. Two directions. Three cars. 4 deadly lanes. Infinite fun. Coming soon to a GameStop near you. 

This project was made in a week for Brackey's Game Jam 2018.  Homework was neglected, giraffes sacrificed.

Credits:  Gabby Delforge, Wesley Pickering, Michael Lu, Eric McCormick

Thanks for playing! Feel free to leave your thoughts or feedback in the comments.
